:src.description: Avatar path, if it fails to load, the default avatar will be displayed (not relative path)
:src.description_zh: 头像路径，如加载失败，将会显示默认头像(不能为相对路径)

size.description: The avatar size can be a specified string (large, default, mini), or a numeric value
size.description_zh: 头像尺寸，可以为指定字符串(large, default, mini)，或者数值

mode.description: The cropping type of the avatar image is the same as the mode parameter of the image component of uni, if the effect does not meet the requirements, you can try to pass the widthFix value
mode.description_zh: 头像图片的裁剪类型，与uni的image组件的mode参数一致，如效果达不到需求，可尝试传widthFix值

text.description: Replace images with text, with levels taking precedence over src
text.description_zh: 用文字替代图片，级别优先于src

bg-color.description: The background color is generally used when displaying text
bg-color.description_zh: 背景颜色，一般显示文字时用

mp-avatar.description: Display the Mini Program avatar, which is only valid for Baidu, WeChat, and QQ Mini Programs
mp-avatar.description_zh: 显示小程序头像，只对百度，微信，QQ小程序有效

random-bg-color.description: Whether or not to use a random background color

default-url.description: Default avatar that failed to load (the component has a built-in default image)
default-url.description_zh: 加载失败的默认头像(组件有内置默认图片)

color-index.description: If randomBgColor is set to true and this value is configured, the color value of the corresponding index is taken from the default background color array, and the value is between 0 and 19
color-index.description_zh: 如果配置了randomBgColor为true，且配置了此值，则从默认的背景色数组中取出对应索引的颜色值，取值0-19之间

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when you click on your avatar
events.parameters: index: 用户传递的标识符
